title: Integrating Computer-Assisted Assessment (CAA) in Mathematics Education Evaluation: Workshop on Utilizing Computer-Based Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and assessment design experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course emphasizing smartphone-based CAA tools, experiencing diverse assessment scenarios through VR simulations

learning_goals: Independently design five or more STACK-based mathematical assessment items
Explain technical limitations and utilization strategies of computer-assisted assessment (CAA) systems
Develop and test at least three assessment simulations executable in smartphone environments
Apply assessment item improvement processes reflecting learner feedback with over 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
